descriptions.start: You are a Tiny King, destined for greatness! Your little lands may only consist of a small wooden shack, and a field, but in them there is the potential for a bustling economy.
descriptions.time: It's the beginning of spring. There are four turns each season: one for morning, afternoon, evening and night. You can move each turn, and also choose actions to perform. Some actions take more than one turn to complete.
descriptions.afternoon: The day has brightened up, but you have a hard decision to make. You have only one portion of grain. Do you keep it to make a simple meal this evening, or do you sow it into your field?
descriptions.eat: Your stomach made the decision for you! If you tap or hover on your character, you'll see that they've now eaten, and this effect will last until this time tomorrow. There's lots of detail about what will happen in grey text in case you need it.
descriptions.skipping_turns: Luckily there are other ways to pick up grain, but you'll need to wait for the summer. Night has drawn in, and certain actions will be unavailable until tomorrow. Time to barricade the doors, and get a good night's sleep.
descriptions.summer: It's now the summer, and the grasslands are full of wild grain, waiting to be picked. Time to get that field planted.
descriptions.sow: Excellent - now you have enough to eat today, and to sow your field.
descriptions.harvest: Your crops are ready! Time to reap the rewards, quite literally. Now you'll have enough grain to last for quite some time.
descriptions.survived: Well done! You've learnt how to survive the winter. Try some different actions, and explore the world. Who knows who (or what) already lives here...

plough.steps.0: Select your character by clicking or tapping on them
plough.steps.1: Click or tap to move your character to the nearest field
plough.steps.3: Press 'End turn' at the bottom of the screen

eat_grain.steps.0: Wait for evening by pressing 'End turn'
eat_grain.steps.1: Hover or tap on your character to check they will eat this evening

skip_turns.steps.0: Press 'End turn' to wait for the morning

gather.steps.0: Move your character to 'Gather grain' on nearby grasslands
gather.steps.2: Repeat so you have 2 portions of grain in your supplies

sow.steps.0: Sow the grain in the field
sow.steps.1: Press 'End turn' twice to wait for the morning
